typostrate:

Monday typography quotes 13

You make me happy. That should be at least someone saying when you are doing your job good, living a colourful life or when you appreciate only the one you’re with. To do this it’s important to be your own trend and follow yourself. Expecting nothing fom eachother makes us a better listener, friend and lover. These monday quotes guide you though the week and above. Have a good start!
